entrees.name: Caviar Blini
entrees.description: Delicate blini topped with premium beluga caviar and crème fraîche.

entrees.name: Burrata Caprese
entrees.description: Creamy burrata with heirloom tomatoes, fresh basil, and balsamic glaze.

entrees.name: Beef Carpaccio
entrees.description: Thinly sliced raw beef tenderloin with arugula, shaved Parmesan, and truffle oil.

entrees.name: Escargot de Bourgogne
entrees.description: Classic French snails in garlic-herb butter, served with a baguette.

entrees.name: Tuna Tartare
entrees.description: Fresh ahi tuna with avocado, sesame, and citrus soy dressing.
